info.title: L10 Game Management Service :: v1.5.13.0-898
info.description:
L10 Game Management Service provides a set of endpoints that expose the defined games and their configuration

Game Records: This set of APIs provides the main configuration for the defined games, e.g. the game records.

Channel Records: This set of APIs provides the per channel configuration for the defined games, e.g. the channel records.

Activate / Deactive: This set of APIs allows the activation / deactivation of the game and channel records, utilized by the L10 Scheduler.

Games Info: This set of APIs provides the basic properties of the defined games.

MatchX Operations: This set of APIs provides the defined program per game and per draw.

Product Bundling: This set of APIs provides operations related to the product bundling.

Operators: This set of APIs provides information about games and their associated operators.

Lookups: This set of APIs provides information about lookups.

tags.name: Activate
tags.description: Endpoints to activate game and channel game versions

tags.name: Deactivate
tags.description: Endpoints to deactivate game and channel game versions

get.summary: Returns the error list of this application
get.description:
This API call returns the errors list of Game Management Service

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5003 Game record already active 400
5006 Something went wrong 500
5012 Active channel record not found 404

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

404.description: A game with the given id was not found

get.summary: Returns basic information for all defined games
get.description:
This API call returns basic information for all defined games, including the operators list.

Available filters

Name Description Required
mjGameId Filter results by multijurisdictional game id (e.g. Eurojackpot) optional
gameFamilyId Filter results by game family id optional
onlyActive If set, it returns only active or inactive games optional
operators Comma seperated ids. If set, it filters with operator ids optional

 

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5020 Game Family not found 404
5006 Unexpected error 500

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: Return only games that are currently active
parameters.name: onlyActive

parameters.description: A comma ',' seperated list of operator ids
parameters.name: operators

404.description: A game with the given id was not found

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer

parameters.name: fromDate

parameters.description: The to date filter. Must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
parameters.name: toDate

get.summary: Compares the affects next draw status between the game records
get.description:
Performs a check between the parameters and returns an indication if the game records differ in parameters that can be applied in next of X future draws

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5004 Game not found 404
5008 Game record not found 404
5006 Unexpected error 500
5025 Same game records 400

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: The id of the first record.
parameters.name: recordA

parameters.description: The id of the second record.
parameters.name: recordB

post.summary: This endpoint activates the selected Channel Record
post.description:
This API call checks and activates the given channel record. If it proceeds with the activation, it deactivates the previous active channel record

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5009 Channel record not found 404
5015 Channel record already active 400
5017 Channel record cannot be activated 400
5018 Channel Record cannot be activated due to invalid Game Record status 400
5006 Unexpected error 500

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

404.description: A record with the given keys was not found

post.summary: This endpoint activates the selected Game Record
post.description:
This API call checks and activates the given game record. If it proceeds with the activation, it deactivates the previous active game record and its channel records before it proceeds with the activation.

In the case of the activation of the first game record, an API call to L10 Game Scheduler is made to notify him about the game initiation.

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5008 Game record not found 404
5003 Game record already active 400
5016 Game record cannot be activated 400
5006 Unexpected error 500

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

400.description: This record cannot be activated (e.g. is already active)

404.description: A record with the given id was not found

post.summary: This endpoint deactivates the selected Channel game record
post.description:
This API call checks and deactivates the given channel record.

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5009 Channel record not found 404
5002 Channel record cannot be deactivated 400
5006 Unexpected error 500

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

400.description: This record id was not active

404.description: A record with the given keys was not found

post.summary: This endpoint deactivates the selected game record
post.description:
This API call checks and deactivates the given game record. If it proceeds with the deactivation, it deactivates all of its child channel records as well.

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5008 Game record not found 404
5002 Game record cannot be deactivated 400
5006 Unexpected error 500

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

400.description: This record id was not active

404.description: A record with the given keys was not found

post.summary: Triggers the service to send notifications for the update
post.description:
This API call triggers a mechanism via web sockets and notifies all connected clients with the configuration of the given product. This API call is used to notify clients when a change for the given product is made.

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5006 Unexpected error 500
5010 Product not found 404

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

404.description: A channel game with the given ids was not found

post.summary: Triggers the service to send notifications for the update
post.description:
This API call triggers a mechanism via web sockets and notifies all connected clients with the configuration of the given channel record. This API call is used to notify clients when a change for the given channel record is made.

See the table below the possible status codes it replies in case of a non 200 response.

Code Description Http Code
1004 Unauthorized 401
5006 Unexpected error 500
5009 Channel record not found 404

parameters.description: Provide the JWT token. The value should start with Bearer
parameters.name: authorization

404.description: A channel game with the given ids was not found

primaryGame.description: The game is defined as primary

primaryGameSelection.description: The game has enabled primary game selection, applies to secondary games only

Games.description: Games which are part of this area.

areaOrder.description: The area order that specifies which game is part of the specific area.

primaryGameSelection.description: The game has enabled primary game selection, applies to secondary games only

areaOrder.description: The area order that specifies which game is part of the specific area.

visualDrawAlgorithm.description: Visual draw Algorithm. Supported Values: Normal, Offset, YYYYC, YYYYWWD

allowCancelOnlyInPlayDraw.description: Allows cancel only in play draw

drawTypes.description: Array of draw types (1: Normal, 2: RaffleDraw) only for Raffle Addon

standAlone.description: Stand-alone or dependent on Main Game

approverId.description: The user who approved the record

userId.description: The user who created the record

partialOdd.description: Partial Odd, applicable when bet type Bonus is selected

amount.description: Jackpot Amount Limit after which passing amount to next category

draws.description: Number of jackpots before passing amount to next category

specialTypeValue.description: Should have data when areaType is Special

selectionsType.description: 1: On the Fly, 2: Import Predefined Cards

checkPayTaxation.description: 0 for active draw, 1 for winning draw

includeRemaininDaysNormal.description: Include Remaining Days of Current Year for Normal Winners

includeRemaininDaysHigh.description: Include Remaining Days of Current Year for High Winners

highWinningPaymentOffset.description: Draw Time Offset to Allow Payment

blacklistedPlaySlips.description: List of blacklisted play slip ids

checkPaymentLimits.description: Sets where payment limits should be checked (allowed values: PayDraw, PlayDraw)

checkPaymentLimitsId.description: Sets where payment limits should be checked

qrCodePlayslip.description: A flag that enables the functionality to accept or reject plays generated through QR code

approverId.description: The user who approved the record

userId.description: The user who created the record
